reviews.review: consiglio :P
"I'm trying to heal you, not shag you!" need I say any more, this is a great survival horror game and arguably the greatest zombie shooter.

DOSH: The Game. 

Basically the aim of the game is to collect the most WONGA to spend on more gun which you can kill more bad guys which gives you more DOSH. The winner is the guy who can create the biggest money shower after completing the final wave.
Grab it while it's hot.
Dont Stress !
Hammer Game hammer Preis!!
Sweet coop
Awesome game! Cant believe I didn't know this before yesterday!!!
BUY IT! :)

Better than L4D2 by miles, it's like a grownups version of L4D2,
This is a game where you face off against hoards of Specimens,
Clots: Zombie like weaklings
Gorefasts: Zombie like, Stronger than clots, has a Sword arm,
Fleshpound: One of the badest bastards there are.
Patriarch: after all that and so much more, you face the Daddy, and he won't be happy, he never is. this bitch packs a Chaingun and a bazooka, and has powers from other zombies.
An Awesome co-op survival shooter! BUY IT!!!
yes

Kinda' like a mix between Call of Duty zombies and L4D Survival, albeit vastly superior to both. I managed to get a friend to buy it while on sale, and now he loves it.

Has a great selection of well-animated and unique weapons, the perk system is an excellent feature, and the waves of lumbering 'zombies' is a lot of fun.

A good buy all around. Heavily supported with balance patches, and free extra content like maps and more weapons to keep the game alive - the only pay-for DLC is optional, namely being custom player customs.
DOSH
its real good

This game is GREAT, with a capital awsome. Plenty of replay value and the single player may not have a story but for being a pretty basic game it met my expectations and blew them outa the room (8.4/10.0) I would MOST definantly suggest getting this game and playing it with your friends is also a good idea...
The only problem i found with it is the fact that it is yet to be fully developed...

Rating:

Get this game if you like zombie survival games like L4D series or zombie mods like ZPS or  ZM
Left4Dead + Counter Strike + Alien Swarm

Ceci est un bon jeux de coop (ou seul dans le mode solo ) où 6 players peuvent rejoindre la même parite , pas mal de serveurs (et de Français aussi :) , plus de 4 difficultés différentes , une trentaine d'armes ( du tout et n'importe quoi ! ) mais dans le fond sympa a par qu'il y a pas d'histoire ( même pas de "vous êtes des survivants , les secours vont bientôt arrivé " (L4D2) ) mais le seul but c'est de SURVIVRE parmis une vingtaine de spécimens divers et variées portant tous sur noël ( même le père est là ) .

Seriez-vous "L'ombre solitaire" où "L'équipe de néttoyage" (payé en heure sup : ) 


                                                        A VOUS DE CHOISIR ! 

Pseudo : sulfurio
A playstyle available for every player as you and a team of friends try to survive wave after wave of unrelenting evil. A must try, for sure.
Addictive co-op survival shooter. Tons of fun with some friends.

A deceptively simple zombie shooter. The 'perks' system - along with the strong support from Tripwire (Free DLC released every so often) and the cheap price tag make this game a 'must have'..
Just don''t be fooled by the lack of a graphic 'wow' factor' (but then graphics don't make a good game right?)
Fun for the whole family :) The famliy that kills zombies together survives together.
killingh floor great game
Great co-op survival game for zombie lovers. 7 perks to advance and numerous achievements will easily give you several hundred hours of gameplay.

不错    挺好玩

A great game for pubbing. The player community is mostly mature and fun. And the "splatch" sound you get from headshots is SO rewarding!

This is one of the most adrenaline pumping, heart-racing, brain-blasting, zombie-mashing co-operative games ever made. Nothing beats it for co-operative survival horror. Nothing.
Hands down the most fun you will ever have with mates at a LAN or online.
Good old fashioned freak slaughtering fun. Bring a friend or five! You'll need all the help you can get.
Buy this. Buy it now!:)
The gunfire is satisfying, and the waves are increasingly intense. Not much fun on your own, but with me on your side its a blast.
The two main features of this game are the killing and the fact that for the most part you will be standing on a floor of some sort.
I love this game!
a thousand times better then left for dead with out the shitty marketing highly recommend

Killing Floor > L4D1/2. Team survival game, 6 different classes with a big selection of weapons. After each wave more monsters and bigger monsters come your way, your team strategy as the game progresses is essential to survival.
Este juego esta saladisimo! y con el mod navideño que los zombies rojos son gengibres, la rompeee!! muy salado, no puede faltar en una lan :D

The only way to get any story from this game is to read the descriptions for each level. It draws heavily from Counter Strike and Left 4 Dead, with a health system similar to Battlefield Badcompany. Enjoyable gameplay, intense atmosphere, and variety make this a must.
Best zombie-killing game on Steam, period.
Very fun game worth the 20 bucks. Very repetitive but its still a ton of fun. Blasting down zeds in slo mo as you run away from a "skank" weilding a chainsaw is totally epic. I LUV THIS GAME !

Bem, o q dezer sobre o KF.... mostros bizarros e sanguinários, heavy metal para dar aquele clima e uma dose de bom humor...
KF é simplismente O jogo!
vale a pena te-lo.

Aburrido, las waves son muy rapidas, moustros predecibles, movimientos lentos, graficos de la epoca que salio painkiller de hecho me senti con en un mashup entre Doom, Call Of Duty y Painkiller. Comprate mejor el Left 4 Dead 2...
If every game and development team behind it was as good as Killing Floor/Tripwire we would achieve world peace.
俺は駄目だった・・・
Seriously one of the best Coop game ever ! So hard , and so stressing :)

I love this game so much.  It mixes heavy metal music with a horrible near future and puts it all together with terribly comical voice acting and ridiculous situations.  Playing it online is absolutely maddening, but challenging and ever-rewarding.

All these years and they still update the game.
Brings me back to the days of doom. Non-stop FPS action that brings just as much fun to a lan party.
Killing Floor isn't a bad game, but it is like a poor man's Left 4 Dead. If you have L4D, and like it, stick with it :)
Awesome zombie game you just gotta try out! It keeps getting updates with new maps, weapons and perks!
Muy buen juego! para pasar el rato con amigos :D
When you feel the need to explode some zombies in everyway possible I turn to this game.

This game has really grown over the years. With the holiday events, the dlc, and the mods this game is nearly endless. I've put a lot of time in to this game and every moment was enjoyable. The gameplay is quick and the music keeps you going. The game can become challenging with the higher difficulty levels for the hardcore, or it can be super simple for the casual. If you enjoy zombies (monsters), waves of destroying enemies, fast pace gameplay this one is for you. The graphics are kind of dated but they still hold up pretty well for something as simple as this game is.

Killing Floor has many similarities to games like Left 4 Dead, or other similar co-op vs. AI shooters. It originally started off as a mod and became what it is today. The developers still support it and it's very inexpensive, and constantly goes on sale. Plus, I must add that the events are always fun, Christmas and Halloween in particular. The developers will usually make a special map, with new dlc, and new skins for the monsters. 

If you want to play something fun with your friends or are looking for something different to play online with others then this could be a good one to try out.
I recommend... wearing a diaper before playing this game.
Great game!

I'm so British I shit the Queen.

Game is pretty intense,  but after seeing the L4D Series base itself off the British Film 28 Days later.. Killing floor kind of ruined the UK setting for me.  This isnt so much a zombie fighting game but you're just fighting waves of monsters.
A great co-op game ;)
Kdo to nekoupí je osel
Just the best.
Новогоднее обновление просто СУПЕР!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Покупайте не пожелеете.

Одна из лучших игр в своем жанре, если, конечно не считать обе части L4D, по
этому, если они вам наскучили - добро пожаловать в КФ. Только не пытаетесь играть в одиночную кампанию - игра вам быстро наскучит.

Always heaps of fun for a zombie shooter.. Gain levels by killing zombies in a certain way which upgrades your class.

Company also constantly adds free content but also supports community by adding community weapon packs which although do cost you dont need to purchase them in order to enjoy the game.

Simply awesome, i've only played it for 1 hour offline and im glad that i got this on sale. Simple, yet amazing mechanics, this game is a must have for every zombie shooter fan. Note that if you run win 7 you MUST tweak the settings, check that on the forums.
9/10
You shoot a clone. You wash your hands. You shoot a clone. You wash your hands.

This game is insanely good value for money. The regular updates, experience point system, and huge cast of playable characters ensures the experience never gets stale. The game demands tactics and cooperation, and is always challenging. At the price of 2 large pizzas what are you waiting for? Stop reading this and buy the damn game!
This game is great fun for when your bored i love how if you get a head shot it goes slow motion, its a good game i would recommend this to anyone

The goal? Survive.  How to achieve this?  Kill specimens.  Awesome soundtrack (Good for playing to in Audiosurf & Beat Hazzard too!) - Coop mode built-in for serious fun with friends.  Runs on most things - uses the Unreal Tournament 2004 engine.
fart
One of my favorite games.  Also, -in my humble opinion- Tripwire Interactive has the best attitude and player loyalty I've ever seen from a developer.

Even though the game doesnt really look up to date with current games, it still beats most games i play even to this day.

Worth a try to give it a shot although i am a little peeved that my stats got reset for some reason.....
Good for LANs, especially when you add more ZEDs to each wave.
Fun for when you just need to kill shit mindlessly and listen to some hardcore music. I just like the katana. Chop shit into little bitz.
A pretty fun, if sometimes aggravating multiplayer game. Best played with friends.
A great game if you got some buddys to play with.
mindless fun.  it's on sale.  you should get it.

The Killing Fields were a number of sites in Cambodia where large numbers of people were killed and buried by the Khmer Rouge regime. As such, the Killing Floor, a game in which you slaughter hordes of clones feels somewhat tasteless. But you can duel wield pistols, so one finds it hard to complain. 5 stars.
This game is has the most thrilling experiences packed inside it, with literally endless waves of fun ahead of it, if you like too shoot, and love the team, buy it, you wont regret it.

Absolutely great game, hard to put down, and easy to run on most PCs.

Game mechanics sometimes are a little stiff and could use some fine tuning.
Considering the old game engine, the graphics are great and well balanced. Lots of fine textures in the game. 
SOO many weapons and character skins to choose from.
Sound track is pretty sweet.

Also,
That chirstmas pack is Brutal !
Classic zombie survival, survive wave after wave of increasingly difficult hordes of zombies. Combined with a class system and cooperative gameplay, makes for a very challenging experience.
Awesomeness!

This game is serious business. Not in itself (the British banter and cheesy pseudo-plot are pretty amusing), but rather in that it's difficult. A very steep learning curve and an at-times unsympathetic fan base can make it hard to get into, but if you do, it's an exciting and well-designed challenge.

Simple and addictive fun. Old school style first person arcade shooter.

Survive the waves of mutated zombies. Earn money and buy better guns and equipment.

The game has also received many free content updates adding new maps, new weapons and new classes even!
Bought if for 4.99 and it was def worth it.
Not like the campaigns in Left 4 Dead, but more similar to a survival round of the latter with more weapon variety and tougher enemies.

Non-stop Zombie Killing with a bunch of Cockney Sparrows.

"It's like Croydon on a Friday Night!"

Updated:

Used to love this game so much - but then it changed.

Two years ago, roughly, they were getting spammed by people to make it harder - so they nerfed the crap out of most of the classes. People with hundreds of hours play said it still wasn't hard enough so they buffed the monsters. People then complained that getting butchered on wave 1 of easy wasn't fun, so they added DLC that allows you compete - for a price.

What started off as a fun co-op game now relies on you being level 6 in all skills and bullet count, otherwise you're voted off and the entire team dies - apart from the guy no-scoping from a glitch point.

If you're wondering whether this is sour grapes, how many other games do you know where the explosives expert is used for killing trash and the melee guy has to crouch to hit the other melee units?

Was a great game - now just ruled by "ITS NOT HARD ENUF YET!"

If you loved left for dead then this game is for you. There is a lot of customizability in this game where you get to choose your own weapons and what you look like. There are times in the game where I get so scared of being alone I freak out and jump around crazy. The graphics are amazing, it really puts you in depth in the game. The sounds in the game really freak me out. it is a very addicting game to play. The online community is very active. If you want to practice there is a single player mode but you don't get the same effects like you would in online play. A must-have for any zombie lovers!!
